body_text:
I want to start getting into Yu-Gi-Oh! where should I start? If I was to start watching all the series of Yu-Gi-Oh! (the orginal one), what should I start with first? 
The books or the movies? And can you please list them in order too?
What's the correct order in which to watch the Yu-Gi-Oh! seasons/episodes? I am wondering what the correct order in which to watch the Yu-Gi-Oh! seasons is.
